Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
The same routine at the supermarket after that.  
It's awkward, so I can't go to that shopping district for a while.  
... Well, if you say it's because of the cute cat, then I guess so.  

Vanilla: "Hmm? Meow meow, meow meow..."  
Vanilla: "There's a really nice smell coming from over there."  
Chocola: "It really is! It smells so savory and delicious, Master!"  
Minaduki Kashou: "Indeed. This scent..."  
He turns his face toward the direction of the smell.  

Tentacle Cat: "Welcome!"  
Tentacle Cat: "How about some freshly made octopus balls?"  
Tentacle Cat: "They're hot and crispy, with plenty of diced bonito—how about them?"  
Chocola: "Wow, it's a cat-run octopus stand! That's rare, Master."

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
[Chocola]: "So as to become a good child, you know!"  
[Vanilla]: "Shigure is strict. But thanks to Master, I've learned so much."  
[Shopkeeper]: "Is that right? You're quite the considerate master."  
[Chocola]: "Ah, but Master is Master!"  
[Chocola]: "And Shigure-chan is just Shigure-chan. Right, Master?"  
[Vanilla]: "To put it simply, Shigure is an important friend."  
[Vanilla]: "Only this Master here gets called 'Master.'"  
[Shopkeeper]: "Heh heh. You're really well-loved, Master?"  
[Kashou>: "Well... I suppose so."  
His elbow lightly jabs me.  
I return the gesture with an awkward, embarrassed smile.  
……Out here, he’s definitely a bit embarrassing.

……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」

当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
A merciless electronic sound echoes from the mobile phone.  
...I thought all I had to do was contact Shigure, and it would be solved immediately.  
[Chocola]: "Mmph, ngu ngu ngu, breakfast is delicious, isn't it!"  
[Chocola]: "Master's breakfast is always delicious, nee~♪"  
[Vanilla]: "Chocola, there's ketchup on your cheek."  
[Vanilla]: "It's artistically cute. I'll lick it off for you. Poyo poyo."  
The actual people are happily munching on their sandwiches.  
By the way, the filling is tomato, cheese, and lettuce.  
It also has a soft-boiled egg sandwiched in between—simple like that.  
For breakfast, I guess this is about as good as it gets.  
[Kashou]: "You guys are going home today, right?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥): "Master"  
With a confident smile, he hands over the delivery slip and pen.  
[嘉祥]: "That's right... um..."  
He double-checks the received delivery slip.  
[嘉祥]: "...It seems like what I ordered is different."  
[食器業者]: "...Really?"  
[食器業者]: "So, you mean the items are wrong...?"  
[嘉祥]: "No, it looks like my order did arrive but—"  
He glances toward the stacked boxes inside the store.  
A small mountain of packed boxes piled up in the shop's limited space; practically nothing remained except for them.  
[嘉祥]: "As you can see, we don’t need this many dishes here..."  
[食器業者]: "I-I apologize! I’ll confirm with headquarters right away—so please wait a moment?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
[食器業者]: "This seems to have been mixed up with another order due to our mistake..."  
[食器業者]: "I assume Master Minaduki will need these soon as well..."  
[食器業者]: "If it's not too much trouble, could you please take the dishes we ordered?"  
[嘉祥]: "Take the order..."  
[嘉祥]: "...Wait, from these?"  
A towering mountain of cardboard boxes.  
Words catch in my throat involuntarily.  
They're all identical boxes at first glance.  
You won't know what's inside until you open them.  
Yet the invoices show they're all top-tier tea sets and tableware.  
This means extreme care must be taken when handling them—otherwise, disaster could follow.  
[嘉祥]: "Well, since we also have store preparations today, it would be nice to receive these now..."  
[嘉祥]: "...But this will take quite some time to sort through, won't it?"

窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou (ご主人さま): "……I wish I could live as simply as a cat. It probably would be easier."  
*Glancing at the shop name stuck on the window.*  
Shaking off a wry smile, she begins organizing the freshly arrived tea set.  

Vanilla: "Hey, where’s that takoyaki stand today?"  
The same evening on Park Street. But tonight, no stalls are in sight.  
*Wanting to send the cats home now but—*  
*No one is around.*  
I forgot my house key too... so I have time until Shigure gets back and can stop by for groceries.  

Chocola: "...Wait, eh? Oh, g-gomen, Vanilla!"

Question:

[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」

バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Chocola, if you're tired, why don't you take a little break?"  
Chocola: "Ah, yes, just a little..."  
Chocola: "But I'm fine. Sorry for worrying you, Master."  
Minaduki Kashou: "...It's not something to apologize for anyway."  
He bows with a troubled smile.  
The reason he isn't feeling well is obvious.  
That's why there's nothing else he can say.  
Minaduki Kashou: "Well, there's a bench right over there, so let's take a little break."  
Vanilla: "Then I'll go get something to drink."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah, sure. For everyone."  
Vanilla: "Understood. Assigned."  
He hands Vanilla some coins and gestures for Chocola to sit on the bench.  
A refreshing sea breeze rustles through the trees in the park.

[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨のお陰様で、予想以上に客足が伸びたこともあるけどな」
[時雨]: 「あら何のことでしょう？」
俺がそれ以上は追求しないことにすると、
時雨も小さく笑って首を傾げて応える。
素直に答えるくらいなら直接言ってるだろうし。
そんなところも昔からの時雨らしさだ。
[時雨]: 「兄さまの仰ることも分かりますが」
[時雨]: 「でもネコは賢い子たちですから。人間の家族にも、パートナーにもなれるくらいに」
[時雨]: 「……だからこそ」
そこで一呼吸を置いて。
困ったような笑顔を浮かべて俺を見る。
[時雨]: 「……自分にも頼ってもらえないのは、きっと寂しいことだと思いますよ？」
その笑顔に胸がズキリと痛む。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well, it's your own fault our clientele increased so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh? Just what might you be talking about?」
I decided not to press further.
Shigure smiled slightly and tilted her head in response.
If she was going to address that issue honestly, she would already have done so by now.
That's how Shigure had always been.
[Shigure]: 「I understand what you are saying, Nii-sama...」
[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou (ご主人さま): "Thanks to Shigure, we've even seen more customers than expected."  
Chocola: "What do you mean?"  
I decided not to pursue the matter further.  
Shigure slightly smiled and tilted her head in response.  
If she’s going to answer honestly, she should just say it directly anyway.  
That’s always been part of Shigure’s nature.  
Chocola: "I understand what Master is saying."  
Chocola: "But cats are smart creatures—they can even become family or partners with humans."  
Chocola: "……So that’s why."  
She paused for a breath then looked at me, wearing an embarrassed smile.  
Chocola: "...It must be lonely not being able to rely on yourself either?"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
携帯の画面を見て眉根を寄せる。
そのまま動かない時雨を見て着信元を察する。
[嘉祥]: 「実家からだろ？　早く出ないと」
[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
Furrows an eyebrow while looking at the phone screen.  
Notices Kashou not moving and deduces the call's origin.  
[Kashou]: "Must be from home, right? You should leave soon."  
[Shigure]: "...I already know what it is even without checking who's calling..."  
The phone in Shigure's hand stops ringing.  
Likewise, Shigure remains silent and...  
clenches the phone tightly.  
[Shigure]: "...Is it because I still haven't grown into a proper woman?"  
[Shigure]: "Or is it because I'm just an ignorant child?"  
[Shigure]: "...So, does that mean I have to obey my father and mother no matter what?"  
[Shigure]: "...I want to stay here."  
[Shigure]: "When Master is suffering... at least—just being by his side would be enough..."

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
Question:
[バニラ]: 「他の病院の場所は知らないし……道を聞ける人も、歩いてない……」
[バニラ]: 「でも、このまま帰るわけにも行かないし……どうしたら……」
不安でぎゅっと手を握り合う。
冷たいシャッターを見上げて下唇をきゅっと噛む。
[警察]: 「キミたち、何してるの？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ……警察さん！」
[ショコラ]: 「開いてる病院教えてもらえませんか！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまが大変で！　それで、お医者さん呼ぼうと思って！」
[バニラ]: 「病院が休みで、どうすればいいか分からなくて……」
[警察]: 「飼い主さんが？　それは大変だけど……」
[警察]: 「キミたち鈴は？　持ってないの？」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「あっ……！」
指摘されて首元に手を当てる。
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.
[Police Officer]: 「What are you two doing there?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah... Ms. Policewoman!」
[Chocola]: 「Where's the closest open clinic?!」
[Chocola]: 「Master is in trouble, so we wanted to get a doctor!」
[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」
[Police Officer]: 「Your Master is? That's a quite a problem, but...」
[Police Officer]: 「Where are your Bells? Don't you have them?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」
We touched our necks where she pointed.
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "I don't know where other hospitals are... and there's no one to ask for directions either."  
Vanilla: "But I can't just go back like this though... what should we do?"  
Clenching her hands tightly in anxiety.  
Looking up at the cold shutter, she bites her lower lip hard.  
Police: "What are you two doing?"  
Chocola: "Ah... Officer!"  
Chocola: "Could you tell us where the open hospital is?!"  
Chocola: "My master is in such trouble! That's why we wanted to call a doctor!"  
Vanilla: "The hospitals are closed, and I don't know what else to do..."  
Police: "Your owner? It’ll be tough but—"  
Police: "And you two aren’t carrying the bell?"  
Chocola & Vanilla: "Ah...!"  
Putting a hand on their necks when pointed out.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
朝イチから予想外の光景に頭がついて来てくれない。
[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。
他のネコたちも同じように笑顔を俺に向けている。
つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ」
reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
Since early morning, my head hasn't been able to keep up with the unexpected sight.  
[時雨]: "Good morning, Onii-sama."  
[時雨]: "I thought a lot about this matter today..."  
A clear smile without any clouds in it.  
The other cats are also smiling at me like that.  
Feeling the cold sweat trickling down my back and saying nothing but,  
[嘉祥]: "Haa... what good will thinking do now?"  
Just managing to say something along those lines.  
[時雨]: "From this matter today, I've realized that asking you not to overwork yourself is unreasonable."  
[時雨]: "But it also seems true how much worry has kept me awake at night as your sister..."  
[時雨]: "So Time Rain thinks the best solution would be to increase personnel and reduce Onii-sama's burden, right?"  
[嘉祥]: "...Haa."

metadata:
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Coconut (ココナツ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「ご心配は無用です、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「兄さまのためならば、私にお給金など不要ですから」
[嘉祥]: 「いやいやいや」
[嘉祥]: 「だってお前門限あるし、平日は学校だってあるんだから……」
[時雨]: 「はい。ですので私一人ではなく、ネコたちが協力してくれるそうですから」
時雨がネコたちへと振り返る。
[ココナツ]: 「嘉祥さまのため、時雨さまの命とあれば」
[メイプル]: 「しょーがないわね、時雨がお小遣いくらいは出してくれるんでしょ？」
[アズキ]: 「ったく。めんどくせーけど飼いネコのつれーとこだよなぁ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「No need to worry, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「If it's for Nii-sama, I don't need any pay.」
[Kashou]: 「No no no no.」
[Kashou]: 「You have a curfew, and on weekdays, you have school...!」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, that's why it's not just me. The catgirls will be helping, too.」
Shigure turned towards them all.
[Coconut]: 「If Shigure-sama orders are so, I'll work for Kashou-sama.」
[Maple]: 「I guess it can't be helped, then. At least Shigure will give me some allowance, right?」
[Azuki]: 「Geez. It's a pain in the butt, but that's the life of an owned catgirl, I guess.」
ModelAnswer:
Timezero: "There's no need to worry, Onii-san."  
Timezero: "If it's for Onii-san, I don't need any allowance anyway."  
Kashou: "No, no, no..."  
Kashou: "Besides, you have your own responsibilities. You go to school on weekdays too..."  
Timezero: "Yes. So it's not just me—the cats will be helping out as well."  
Timezero turns back toward the cats.  
Coconut: "If it means Master Timezero and Onii-san, I won’t mind at all!"  
Maple: "Well, if you think about it... she'll probably give us some pocket money anyway?"  
Azuki: "Ugh. It's such a hassle having to take care of pet cats like this."

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[バニラ]: 「ナイスタイミング。さすが、ご主人。外さない」
[嘉祥]: 「バニラ、何か話してたのかい？　お客さん、楽しそうに笑ってたけど」
[バニラ]: 「……ん」
[バニラ]: 「私とショコラは、とっても仲良しだって」
[嘉祥]: 「はは……お客さんが、ちょっと見ただけでもわかるんだなぁ」
[バニラ]: 「ふふ……」
[ショコラ]: 「にゃー、ご主人さまとバニラが、仲よさそうに話してる！」
[ショコラ]: 「ショコラも混ぜてくださいー！」
[バニラ]: 「べつに……注文を伝えてただけ」
[嘉祥]: 「仕事中だぞ、ショコラ」
[ショコラ]: 「ぎにゃー！？」
[嘉祥]: 「おしゃべりなら、あとで、ゆっくりな」
[バニラ]: 「行こう、ショコラ」
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「Nice timing. You're always so on point, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Vanilla, did you have a chat with those customers? They have some pretty happy smiles on their faces.」
[Vanilla]: 「...Mm.」
[Vanilla]: 「They said that me and Chocola get along really well.」
[Kashou]: 「Hahah... Guess they can pick up on that just from one look.」
[Vanilla]: 「Tee hee...」
[Chocola]: 「Meow! Master and Vanilla are having a fun conversation without Chocola!」
[Chocola]: 「You should let Chocola join in, too!」
[Vanilla]: 「Not really... I was just relaying the orders I took.」
[Kashou]: 「We're on the clock, Chocola.」
[Chocola]: 「Grk-nya?!」
[Kashou]: 「We can have a nice, long chat later, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Let's get going, Chocola.」
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "Perfect timing. Just like you, Master."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Vanilla, were we talking about something? The customer seemed to be laughing happily earlier."  
Vanilla: "...m"  
Vanilla: "Me and Chocola are very close friends, you know~"  
Minaduki Kashou: "Haha... I guess that was obvious just by looking at the customer for a moment."  
Vanilla: "Fufu..."  
Chocola: "Nyaa! Master and Vanilla look so friendly talking together!"  
Chocola: "Please let me join in too, nya~!"  
Vanilla: "I don't mind... I was just passing along an order."  
Minaduki Kashou: "We're working right now, Chocola~"  
Chocola: "Giyaa?!"  
Minaduki Kashou: "If you want to chat, do it slowly later on!"  
Vanilla: "Let's go, Chocola."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[バニラ]: 「ん？　ショコラ、その手の中のメモは、なに？」
[ショコラ]: 「あっ、そうだにゃ！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さま、お誕生日ケーキの注文、いただきました！」
[嘉祥]: 「お、そいつは嬉しいな」
[バニラ]: 「……誕生日は、誰にとっても特別なもの。その１年に１回の記念日に、ソレイユのケーキを選んでもらえたのは、とっても光栄なこと」
[ショコラ]: 「そう言ってましたもんね、ご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「うん。ちゃんと名前と年齢と連絡先、書いてもらったか？」
[ショコラ]: 「はい！　今回はバッチリです！」
[ショコラ]: 「種類とサイズも、しっかり聞いてあります！」
[嘉祥]: 「メッセージは○○くん、お誕生日おめでとう！でいいのかな？」
[ショコラ]: 「えーっと……」
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「Hm? Chocola, what's that note in your hand?」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, that's ryght!」
[Chocola]: 「Master, we have an order for a birthday cake!」
[Kashou]: 「Ooh, that's good news.」
[Vanilla]: 「...Birthdays are a special time for everyone. It is a great honor for someone to select a cake from La Soleil for their once-a-year celebration.」
[Chocola]: 「Yep, you've said that in the past, right, Master?!」
[Kashou]: 「Sure have. So, did you make sure to get their name, age, and contact info?」
[Chocola]: 「Yes! All here, perfectly, this time!」
[Chocola]: 「Chocola even asked them the type and size they wanted, too!」
[Kashou]: 「What about the message? Will just 'Happy Birthday 〇〇-kun!' do?」
[Chocola]: 「Um, well...」
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "Huh? Chocola, what's that memo in your hand?"  
Chocola: "Ah, right!"  
Chocola: "Master, I've received the birthday cake order!"  
Minaduki Kashou (Kashou): "Oh, that's nice."  
Vanilla: "...A birthday is special for everyone. Getting you to choose La Soleil's cake as a once-a-year commemoration must be truly honorable."  
Chocola: "That's what Master said!"  
Minaduki Kashou (Kashou): "Right. Did they write the name, age, and contact info correctly?"  
Chocola: "Yes! This time it's perfect!"  
Chocola: "They also confirmed the type and size properly."  
Minaduki Kashou (Kashou): "Is 'Happy Birthday, ○○-kun!' good for the message?"  
Chocola: "Uh..."

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やれやれ……お客さんが帰る前でよかった」
[バニラ]: 「やっぱり、記入シートを作ったほうがいい。あとで私が用意しておく？」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとう、助かるよ」
[嘉祥]: 「ところで、冬服の着心地はどうだい？　屋内だと暑かったりしないか？」
[バニラ]: 「夏服でも、歩き回っていると気にならなかったけど……」
[バニラ]: 「扉が開いたときに、外の風が入ってくるとストーブが恋しくなった」
[バニラ]: 「冬服は暖かい。これは、よいもの。感謝」
[嘉祥]: 「そいつはよかった」
[ショコラ]: 「ショコラ、戻りました！　冬服もかわいいから、バッチリです、ご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「はは。時雨に用意してもらって正解だったよ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Good grief... Good thing the customer didn't leave yet.」
[Vanilla]: 「I think making an entry form would be a good idea after all. I'll spruce one up later, okay?」
[Kashou]: 「Thanks, I'd appreciate that.」
[Kashou]: 「By the way, how are the winter clothes treating you? It's not too hot or anything indoors for you, is it?」
[Vanilla]: 「I was comfortable enough walking around in summer clothes as well, but...」
[Vanilla]: 「Once the door is opened and the breeze comes in, I end up longing for the space heater.」
[Vanilla]: 「The winter clothes are warm. These are good. I'm grateful.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, that's good to hear.」
[Chocola]: 「Chocola is back! The winter clothes are perfect; they're so cute, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「Hahah. Then asking Shigure to prepare them was the right call.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Well... that's good. It was better before the guests left."  
Vanilla: "After all, it would be best to make an entry sheet. Should I prepare one for you later?"  
Minaduki Kashou: "Thank you, that would help."  
Minaduki Kashou: "By the way, how does the winter clothing fit? Doesn't it feel too warm indoors?"  
Vanilla: "Even with summer clothes, walking around didn’t bother me..."  
Vanilla: "But when the door opened and outside wind blew in, I suddenly missed the stove."  
Vanilla: "Winter clothes are warm. This is great—thank you."  
Minaduki Kashou: "That’s good."  
Chocola: "Chocola is back! The winter clothes look cute too, so it's perfect, Master!"  
Minaduki Kashou: "Heh. Having Shigure prepare them was the right call."

metadata:

Question:
[アズキ]: 「そうみたいだな。丁寧に手で磨かないと、すぐ傷がついちまう」
１個１個、布に当てて、表面の毛を落としていく。
[シナモン]: 「ごしごし……ごしごし……」
茎も丁寧に取らないと、えぐれて穴が開くと見栄えが悪い。
[シナモン]: 「はぁ……はぁ……美味しそう……」
[アズキ]: 「つまみ食いするなよ？　どんなにイチゴが美味しそうでも、絶対につまみ食いするなよ？」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～ん、イチゴ、つやつや～♪」
[シナモン]: 「わたしの手で、テカテカに光っていくのが……ドキドキしちゃう～♪」
[アズキ]: 「まぁ、慣れてくると楽しいけど……ドキドキするか？」
[アズキ]: 「相変わらず、モンシナの言うことは、よくわかんねぇな」
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Seems that way. You have to carefully polish them by hand or they bruise pretty easily.」
I take a cloth to each individual strawberry and wipe off the fuzz on the surface layer.
[Cinnamon]: 「Rubba rub... Rubba rub...」
And unless you carefully pluck out the stem, you'll gouge out a hole and ruin the presentation.
[Cinnamon]: 「Hah... Hah... It looks so delicious...」
[Azuki]: 「Hey, no sneaking bites, okay? I don't care how delicious the strawberries look, you're NOT allowed to sneak any bites, you hear?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~m, such glossy strawberries~♪」
[Cinnamon]: 「Knowing that my hands are making them gleam bright... is sending my heart aflutter~♪」
[Azuki]: 「Well, it does get fun the more you get used to it, but... uh, is it THAT exciting?」
[Azuki]: 「Y'know, you never fail to say stuff I just can't wrap my head around, Mon-cinna.」
ModelAnswer:
[AZUKI]: "Looks like that's the case. If you don't polish it carefully by hand, it'll get scratched right away."  
One by one, she rubs them against the cloth to remove the surface hairs.  
[CINNAMON]: "Grrr... grrr..."  
If you don't peel the stems carefully, they'll get hollow and look bad."  
[CINNAMON]: "Haa... haa... It looks so delicious..."

reference_answer:
I had simply thought that this wasn't the sort of thing I'd go out of my way to talk about; it wasn't because I was trying to hide it from anyone.
The rush of customers has finally died down, and we're done bringing out the customers' orders. They're all sitting, quietly enjoying their tea and cake.
Normally, this would be the part in the day where the girls would be swapping in for breaks.
[Kashou]: 「You see... Dad was planning on making me run the family business. Or, so I thought. I'm not too sure about now.」
[Kashou]: 「Still, he drilled a lot of lessons into me... He would tell me to learn the flavor of each thing he had me taste.」
[Kashou]: 「Dad was also the one who taught me the basics of culinary arts.」
[Kashou]: 「It was a tough process, and I did harbor some resentment over it all, but...」
[Kashou]: 「Nowadays, I'm grateful that all of that ended up being useful.」
[Kashou]: 「But, I was opposed... to me running the family business as if it were already set in stone.」
ModelAnswer:
It wasn't something I felt needed to be spoken about, and there was no reason to hide it.  
The customers had calmed down by now, the ordered items in the shop were all served, and they were enjoying their tea peacefully.  
This would normally have been my break time if we rotated shifts like usual.  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "……My father... I think he intended for me to inherit the wagashi shop after him. It's hard to say now, but..."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "...He taught me a lot of things—like memorizing flavors and trying all sorts of foods."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "It was my father who also taught me the basics of cooking."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "There were times when it felt overwhelming, or even grating..."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "...But now I see how useful everything is and am grateful for all of it. Still—I resented inheriting the shop like it was inevitable from the start."

[Kashou]: 「Hahah... Hey, I know that you're a big eater, Coconut, which is why I made sure to make a lot to compensate.」
ModelAnswer:

Coconut: "Mmmph mmmph mmmph mmmph mmmph mmmph mmmph mmmph..."  
Azuki: "Nuts, it's your birthday party today, right? You understand this, don't you?"  
Coconut: "Of course, Onii-chan!"  
Coconut: "All the treats I want~ I can eat as much as I want, right?"  
Azuki: "The guest of honor won't have anything to eat if you gobble everything down. Be reasonable."  
Coconut: "Ah, ahh..."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Haha... Well, since I know Nuts will eat a lot, that's why I prepared extra."

Question:

言いながら、時雨がラッピングされた小箱を取りだした。

reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「Hah... The dishes are good for sure, but this tea... Such a heavenly aroma~ The flavor is bursting in my mouth. Your tea choices are second to none, May-chan♪」
[Maple]: 「Tea leaves with a rich aroma suit a party atmosphere well. Today, I went with a champagne flavor.」
[Maple]: 「And with a glass teapot, you get to enjoy the sight of the flower petals mixed with the tea leaves dancing around in the water.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Fantastic~ Absolutely fantastic, May-chan~♪ Cinnamon is drooliiiing~...!」
[Shigure]: 「Mother, I'd like to say it once more: Happy birthday to you.」
Shigure pulls out a small gift-wrapped box as she speaks.
[Awayuki]: 「My, my, what could it be?」

[Awayuki]: 「My, oh my, this is wonderful! Are you sure? Are you positive? Thank you, Shigure!」
ModelAnswer:
[CINNAMON]: "Haa... the cooking is nice too, but this tea... lovely aroma~. A lively flavor—just like Maple's choice♪"  
[MAPLE]: "Strong-scented tea leaves suit a party, don't they? Today it's champagne flavor."  
[MAPLE]: "If you use a glass teapot, even the flower petals mixed in with the tea leaves will look like dancing in the hot water—that’ll be fun too!"  
[CINNAMON]: "Perfect~♪ Perfect, Maple~♪ Cinnamon's getting all moist~...!"  
[SHIGURE]: "Mother, once again—happy birthday."  
As Shigure picks up the wrapped small box.  
[AWAYUKI]: "Oh? What is it?"

[AWAYUKI]: "My, my! How delightful~! May I take it? May I take it? Thank you, Shigure!"

Question:
[淡雪]: 「昔から、嘉祥は１つのことに夢中になると、他のことを忘れてしまうんだから」
[嘉祥]: 「返す言葉もない」
[淡雪]: 「いいのよ、嘉祥はケーキ屋さんなんだから。ケーキが一番のプレゼントだわ」
[嘉祥]: 「そう言ってもらえると……。でも、近いうちに持ってくるよ」
[淡雪]: 「そう？　楽しみにしているわ」
[時雨]: 「それでは、ちょっと予定と違いますが、ケーキを出しましょうか」
[ショコラ]: 「わーい！　ご主人さまのケーキにゃ！」
[ココナツ]: 「ケーキ！　ぼ、ぼく、持ってくるよ！！」
[バニラ]: 「待った、ココナツ。落ちついて。ステイ」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「You've always been the type to forget about everything else when you get focused on one thing, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know what to say.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, it's fine. You're a cake baker, Kashou. A cake is the best present I could ask for.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm glad to hear you say that... Still, I'll bring you a proper present sometime soon.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, really? Then, I look forward to it.」
[Shigure]: 「Well then, it deviates from my plans slightly, but why don't we bring out the cake now?」
[Chocola]: 「Yay! It's time for Master's cake, nya!」
[Coconut]: 「Cake! I-I volunteer to bring it out!」
[Vanilla]: 「Hold it, Coconut. Down, girl. Stay.」
ModelAnswer:
[淡雪]: "Ever since, if Master gets obsessed with one thing, he forgets about everything else."  
[嘉祥]: "There's nothing I can say in return..."  
[淡雪]: "It's fine though. Since you're a cake shop owner, the most precious gift is cake anyway~"

[淡雪]: "Really? I’m looking forward to it!"

[ショコラ]: "Yay! Master's cake!"

[バニラ]: "Wait, Coconut. Calm down. Steady."

Question:
お客さんからお褒めの言葉をもらうことはあるが、母親から言われると妙に照れてしまう。
ネコたちも、瞳を輝かせていた。
[ショコラ]: 「ステキですにゃ、ご主人さま～！」
[バニラ]: 「良い」
[アズキ]: 「まぁ、アタシは手伝ったから、完成品を見てっけどな」
[メイプル]: 「気合い入ってるわね」
[シナモン]: 「お、おいしそう～……じゅるり」
[ココナツ]: 「すごい……かわいい。食べちゃうのがもったいないくらいだよ！」
[淡雪]: 「ほんと。切ってしまうのが、もったいないわねー」
[淡雪]: 「ずっと部屋に飾っておきたいくらい」
[時雨]: 「わかります、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「でしょう？」
reference_answer:
I've certainly gotten compliments from customers before, but getting one from my own mother is making me blush, oddly enough.
All of the catgirls have their eyes alight.
[Chocola]: 「That is so lovely, Master~!」
[Vanilla]: 「Very good.」
[Azuki]: 「I mean, I helped with it, but call me curious to see the finished product.」
[Maple]: 「You really went all out.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I-It looks so delicious~... Slurp.」
[Coconut]: 「Amazing... It's so cute. It almost feels like a shame to eat it!」
[Awayuki]: 「It really does. Cutting into it feels almost criminal.」
[Awayuki]: 「I want to just keep it as a room decoration forever.」
[Shigure]: 「I know how you feel, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「Right?」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪): "It's rare to receive praise from customers, but when it comes from my mother, I get embarrassingly flustered."  

The cats also had their eyes shining.  

[Chocola]: "So cute, Master~!"  

[Vanilla]: "Good"  

[Azuki]: "Well, I helped with this too, so seeing the finished product is fine by me..."  

[Maple]: "She’s putting in a lot of effort."  

[Cinnamon]: "Mmm, it looks delicious~... slurp"  

[Coconut]: "Wow... such cute things. It’d be a waste to eat them!"  

SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪): "Really. It would be too sad to cut into it."  

SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪): "I’d want to keep it displayed in the room forever."

Question:
[メイプル]: 「それだと食べられないので……切りますよ？」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。仕方ありません、やってください、メイプル」
[メイプル]: 「さくさくさく、っと」
メイプルがケーキに包丁を入れ、手早く切り分けていく。
[淡雪]: 「あらー……」
[淡雪]: 「なんだか、ネコたちも、ずいぶん手慣れたわね。包丁の扱いがプロみたいだわ」
[時雨]: 「お店で働いてますから、もうプロですよ、母様」
[淡雪]: 「あら、そうよね！　うふふ……頼もしいわね」
ケーキが切り分け終わった、そのときだった――
玄関のほうから、扉が開く音がする。
[時雨]: 「えっ！？」
[淡雪]: 「あら、この開け方は、お父さまねぇ。今日は早く帰ってきたみたい」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「We won't be able to eat it if it spoils, so... it has to get cut.」
[Shigure]: 「You're right. It's a necessary evil. Please, do the deed, Maple.」
[Maple]: 「All right, slice, slice, slice.」
Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my...」
[Awayuki]: 「Seems the catgirls have become quite skilled themselves. She's handling the knife like a professional.」
[Shigure]: 「They all work in the shop, so they are professionals, Mother.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my, that's right! Tee hee hee... Such reliable girls.」
Once the cake is all sliced up, that's when it happens—
From the foyer, the sound of the door opening echoes.
[Shigure]: 「Huh?!」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, that sounds like your father opening the door. He must be back early today.」
ModelAnswer:
MAPLE: "If it's like that, I can't eat it... so I'll cut it?"  
SHIGURE: "That's right. There's no other way—do it, Maple."  
MAPLE: "Chop chop chop..."  
Maple cuts into the cake with a knife and quickly slices it apart.  
AWAYUKI: "Ohh..."  
AWAYUKI: "The cats seem to have gotten really used to this too. They handle knives like pros."  
SHIGURE: "Because I work at a restaurant, I already am a pro, Mother."  
AWAYUKI: "Oh, that's right! Ufufu... You've grown so reliable."  
The cake was finally sliced—just then—  
From the front door, the sound of it opening could be heard.  
SHIGURE: "What?!"  
AWAYUKI: "This way of opening must be Father-from. He seems to have come back early today."

Question:
俺は緊張して身を固くする。
ネコたちも息を呑んだ。
[州浜]: 「…………ふん」
この男が、俺の父親――水無月州浜だ。
[時雨]: 「あの、父様……今夜は、商工会の寄合だったはずでは……？」
[州浜]: 「そうだが……私が帰宅すると、不都合でも？」
[時雨]: 「そ、そんなことは……」
[ショコラ]: 「あの！　ご主人さまのお父さま、お帰りなさーい！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人のお父上、予想外にお早いご帰宅」
[ココナツ]: 「お、お父さま、お帰りなさいませ！」
[州浜]: 「うむ」
[メイプル]: 「……これ、やばいんじゃないかしら？」
reference_answer:
My body freezes up from the tension.
The catgirls are also taken aback.
[Suhama]: 「...Hmph.」
This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.
[Shigure]: 「Um, Father... I thought you had a community chamber get-together to attend tonight...?」
[Suhama]: 「I did. Is there something wrong with me coming back home?」
[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」
[Chocola]: 「Um! Welcome back home, Master's Father!」
[Vanilla]: 「Master's Father, you have returned earlier than we anticipated.」
[Coconut]: 「F-Father, welcome back!」
[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」
[Maple]: 「...Hey, isn't this bad news?」
ModelAnswer:
I tense up and stiffen my body.  
The cats gasp in shock.  
Suhama: "…………huff"  
This man is my father—Water Moon Suhama.  
Shigure: "Um, Father... tonight was supposed to be the Commerce Association meeting, wasn't it?"  
Suhama: "That's right... but if I come home now, will that be a problem?"  
Shigure: "N-No such thing..."  
Chocola: "Excuse me! Master's father, welcome home!"  
Vanilla: "Master's father returning earlier than expected."  
Coconut: "Oh, Father, welcome home!"  
Suhama: "Mmm."  
Maple: "...This seems dangerous, doesn't it?"

Question:
[淡雪]: 「嬉しかったわよ。こんな賑やかなのは久しぶりだもの」
[淡雪]: 「お父さま、座ってはどうかしら。嘉祥のケーキ、とっても美味しそうでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「あ、そうです！　父様、今日こそ兄様のケーキを食べてください！」
[時雨]: 「食べてみれば、兄様が本気で打ちこんでいるってわかるはずです！」
俺は思わず息を呑んだ。父親が、俺の作ったケーキを食べるだろうか？
何と言うだろうか？
[ショコラ]: 「賛成です！　ご主人さまの美味しいケーキを食べれば、みんな仲良しにゃのです！」
[バニラ]: 「間違いない」
[ココナツ]: 「うんうん！　お兄ちゃんのケーキ、本当に美味しいんだから！」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「I'm so glad that you did. It hasn't been this lively in quite some time, after all.」
[Awayuki]: 「Father, why not take a seat? Kashou's cake looks quite good, doesn't it?」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, yes! Father, today should be the day you partake in one of Nii-sama's cakes!」
[Shigure]: 「If you do, you will realize that Nii-sama has really devoted his all toward baking it!」
I find myself taken aback. Would Dad consider eating a cake I made?
What would he say?
[Chocola]: 「Chocola agrees! One bite of Master's delicious cake and everyone gets alyong!」
[Vanilla]: 「Without a shadow of a doubt.」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah! Yeah! Onii-chan's cakes are really good, after all!」
ModelAnswer:
[淡雪]: "I was so happy. It's been a while since things were this lively."  
[淡雪]: "Father, why don't you sit down? This cake by Kashou looks really delicious, doesn’t it?"  
[時雨]: "Oh, that’s right! Father, today’s the day to eat brother’s cake!"  
[時雨]: "If you try it, you’ll see he put his heart into making it!"  
I almost gasped. Would my father actually eat the cake I made? What would he say...?  
[ショコラ]: "I agree! If we all eat master’s delicious cake, we can be good friends too!"  
[バニラ]: "No mistake."  
[ココナツ]: "Mmm! Big brother’s cake is really tasty after all!"

Question:

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?"  

There was something I wanted to ask a supplier about—it wasn’t urgent, but it would be best to call early. While dealing with an individually owned patisserie is normal for most people, each of my suppliers negotiates directly with me personally. Even ingredients not commonly available in general distribution can sometimes be sourced if ordered in bulk from farms willing to sell them. The pursuit of flavor has been a journey into itself when searching for the right materials.  

When everyone else was excited about sightseeing around here, bringing up work would have seemed tacky—so I claimed private business and left my room. To avoid any risk at all, even leaving the inn to speak somewhere quiet... The phone rings.

それでショコラやシナモンは他の所へ行き、この２人だけで勝負していたわけか。

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, catch you guys at a bad time?」

[Vanilla]: 「You said that you were taking it seriously a second ago.」
[Maple]: 「Urk... This time. This time, it's for real.」
It seems that Vanilla won their last rally.
[Kashou]: 「I wasn't able to see the ball again. Catgirls really are something else.」
[Vanilla]: 「Master, that's not true.」
[Maple]: 「Even with catgirls, if it's not your forte, then it's not your forte. Like, take Cinnamon. Give her a paddle and she'll whiff immediately.」
[Vanilla]: 「And Chocola tries to catch the ball with her hands.」
[Kashou]: 「Interesting.」
So Chocola and Cinnamon went somewhere else while these two duked it out in ping-pong, then.
[Kashou]: 「Now that I think of it, seeing you two together is a rare sight.」
ModelAnswer:

Maple (メイプル): "What are you saying? Is this a game?"  
Vanilla (バニラ): "You said seriously earlier though."

Apparently, the previous rally was won by Vanilla.

Vanilla: "Chocola catches them with her hands instead."

So Chocola and Cinnamon went elsewhere, meaning these two were playing a match.  
Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥): "Speaking of which, it's rare for just Maple and Vanilla to play together."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥): "Shall I try one?"  
Bought a freshly made onsen manjū from the street stall. It was hot and steaming.  
When I took a bite, it was soft and more chewy than expected.  
On my tongue, the filling crumbled slightly as sweetness spread out.  
Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥): "I see... mmf mmmff... this is delicious."  
The Western sweets I make at home don’t involve serving hot food either do they? The family’s traditional sweets aren’t served warm like this, are they.  
Eating the steaming manjū while mumbling "mmf mmmff" was an interesting experience in its own way.  
Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥): "Come to think of it... I must have visited hot spring towns several times before but… never tried eating here."  
There were no cats back then, after all. Even when traveling with my parents and Shigure—it wouldn’t even cross our minds to do something like this.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Well, here you are, Shigure. Were you here for something?"  
Shigure: "No, it's fine now."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Were you on a work call too, Shigure?"  
Shigure: "...Yes. Sorry. I ruined your trip."  
Minaduki Kashou: "It's not something to apologize for. La Soleil is closed today, but the world isn’t."  
I hadn’t heard details before, but it seems Shigure runs a company too. With that income—buying clothes for the cats or letting Bell take exams... His father might be strict with me, but he spoils his sister. He lets her do whatever she wants when it comes to both the cats and business."  
Minaduki Kashou: "The cats were enjoying themselves as much as they could too—playing ping-pong, games… even the snack stand..."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それはよかったです。……兄様、たまには兄妹水入らずで遊びませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いいけど、何する？」
[時雨]: 「カラオケルームがあるそうですよ？」
[嘉祥]: 「カラオケか……高校時代に、ちょっと行ったきりだな。時雨、歌えるのか？」
[時雨]: 「幼少期に合唱をやっていましたから、少しは」
そういうことになった。
[時雨]: 「それでは、兄様への想いを込めて……」
歌いはじめると、雰囲気が一変した。
[時雨]: 「～～～♪」
[嘉祥]: 「……すごい」
[時雨]: 「はぁ～、ひさしぶりに大きな声を出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「めちゃくちゃ上手いじゃないか！」
はっきり言って、プロ並だった。俺は惜しみない拍手を送る。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am glad to hear that... Nii-sama, how about we both enjoy ourselves—just us, as brother and sister?」
[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure: "That's good... Master, shall we play sibling-style for once?"  
Minaduki Kashou: "Sure, but what will you do?"  
Minaduki Shigure: "I heard there’s a karaoke room."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Karaoke?... I only went once back in high school. Shigure, can you sing?"  
Minaduki Shigure: "I did chorus as a child, so a little."  
That was how it happened.  
Minaduki Shigure: "Then, with all my feelings for Master..."  
As she began singing, the atmosphere changed completely.  
Minaduki Shigure: "~♪~"  
Minaduki Kashou: "... incredible"  
Minaduki Shigure: "Haa~, it’s been a while since I used my voice like this."  
Minaduki Kashou: "You’re seriously amazing at it!"  
To be frank, she was pro-level. I gave her an unreserved round of applause.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「そんなに兄様に褒めていただけるなんて……幸福の極みです」
[時雨]: 「私の歌が、兄様に喜んでいただけるなんて……この声が……兄様の記憶に……はぁ、はぁ……」
[時雨]: 「うっ……鼻血が……」
[嘉祥]: 「お、おい、大丈夫か？」
[時雨]: 「ううぅ……よろしければ、次は兄様が歌ってくださいまし」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……わ、わかった」
２人でカラオケに来て、歌わないというわけにもいかないか。抜群に上手い時雨のあとでは、つらいものがあるが……
[嘉祥]: 「えーっと……新しめの曲だと、留学してたときに覚えたやつが……」
リストを探してみる。
[嘉祥]: 「あれ？　見つからないな……ほどほどにヒット曲だと思うんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I never expected you to give me such ample praise... I am absolutely thrilled.」
[Shigure]: 「To think that my singing could delight you so much... This voice... is in your memories... Hah, hah...」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I feel a nosebleed coming on...」
[Kashou]: 「H-Hey, are you all right?」
[Shigure]: 「Unghh... If it is not too much to ask, would you sing a song next?」
[Kashou]: 「Urk... O-Okay, fine.」
The two of us are here to do some karaoke, so I very well can't NOT sing, huh? Though, going up after an excellent singer like Shigure does load on the pressure...
[Kashou]: 「Um, let's see... For newish songs, there's that one I learned back when I was studying abroad...」
I search the list.
[Kashou]: 「Huh? I can't find it... I thought it was more or less a hit song, too...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "Being praised by Master to such an extent... This is the pinnacle of happiness."  
Shigure: "That my song would make Master happy... These vocals, in Master's memory... Haa, haa..."  
Shigure: "Ugh... Nosebleed?"  
Kashou: "O-Oishii! Are you okay?!"  
Shigure: "Uuoo... If it's alright, next time please let Master sing instead."  
Kashou: "Uuh... Wa, I see."  
We came to karaoke together; there’s no way we can avoid singing. After Shigure—who is overwhelmingly skilled—it feels like a struggle though…  
Kashou: "Ee-tto... A new song? Something I learned while studying abroad?"  
Searching through the list.  
Kashou: "Ah, that's right! Can’t seem to find it now... It should be somewhat popular, don’t you think…?"

Indeed, I couldn't seem to fall asleep.  
I carefully made my way out of the room without making a sound.  
The inn has a nightlight on, but once you leave it, it’s the darkness of the countryside.  
In some places, the darkness is so thick you can’t even see your own feet.  
The hot spring town, bustling with tourists during the day, takes on an entirely different atmosphere at this late hour.  
I looked down from the bridge.  
It was pitch black.  
Only the sound of water flowing in the river could be heard.  
A moon might have been visible reflected on the river surface... or maybe that’s just a streetlight?  
To check, I peered over the edge of the bridge.

[嘉祥]: 「なにやってるんだ、時雨……？」

[嘉祥]: 「いや……パリでも、そんな貴族みたいなドレス姿は、そうそう見かけないんだが……」
パリは石畳の道が多く、階段を使うことも多く、ハイヒールは転倒の危険がある。女性でもスニーカーや革靴を履く者が多い。
そして、スリムなジーンズをはいている女性は多く、スカート姿の女性は珍しい。
服の色は黒か白だ。ベージュや柄物のアウターを着ているのは、おおねむ観光客だった。
[時雨]: 「残念です……完璧だと思ったのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、まぁ……その格好も似合ってるから、いいんじゃないか？」
reference_answer:
Yeah, as if! Not even I would mistake someone else for my little sister.
[Kashou]: 「What are you doing here, Shigure...?」
[Shigure]: 「...So, you ended up finding me, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「I was trying to perfectly blend in with the local people.」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Even in Paris, you don't really see people running around with such an aristocratic-looking dress.」
Paris is full of stone-paved roads and you're often climbing stairs, so wearing high-heels is risky. Even the majority of ladies wear sneakers or leather shoes.
Also, most girls wear slim jeans, so girls in skirts are rare.
Their clothes are usually black or white. Mostly anyone wearing beige or patterned outerwear is a tourist.
[Shigure]: 「How unfortunate... I thought it was perfect...」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Your outfit looks nice on you, so it's fine, right?」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure: That makes no sense! Even I wouldn't mistake my sister.  
[Kashou]: "What are you doing, Shigure...?"  
[Shigure]: "...Found me already, Master."  
[Shigure]: "I thought I had blended in perfectly with the locals here."  
[Kashou]: "No... Even in Paris, dresses like that noblewoman's aren’t common—"  
Paris has many cobblestone streets and stairs, making high heels dangerous to walk in. Many women wear sneakers or leather shoes instead.  
There are also many women wearing slim jeans; those in skirts are rare.  
Most clothing is black or white. Those wearing beige or patterned outerwear were likely tourists.  
[Shigure]: "...I’m sorry... I thought it was perfect—"  
[Kashou]: "Well... That outfit suits you, so it’s fine."

[Kashou]: 「Yes...」

[Kashou]: 「Unghh...」
I find myself lost with my thoughts running around in circles in my head.
[Beignet]: 「I told you that I wouldn't do you any good, didn't I? Why not get back to Japan while you still can?」

Minaduki Kashou: "Yeah, probably."

Minaduki Kashou: "Yes..."  
Perhaps what’s missing from me is something else. And my father and mentor understand it. But there's no way to explain it in words like this.

Distraught, his thoughts spun around in circles again.

Minaduki Kashou: "Ah, no! If only I could find something—it's impossible to go back."

Question:
そのケーキは新作で、初めて食べる味だったが、間違いなく師匠の味で……
新鮮なのに懐かしかった。
[嘉祥]: 「……これを食べに、この街へと来たような気がします」
[ベニエ]: 「少しは落ちついたかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「わかりませんが……俺は、そんなに酷かったですか？」
[ベニエ]: 「迷子の仔猫のような顔をしていたわね」
[嘉祥]: 「お恥ずかしいかぎりです」
[嘉祥]: 「正直、お店の手伝いをしているときは、こんなことしている場合なのか？って気持ちも、少しはあったんです」
[嘉祥]: 「俺、クリスマスまでに、父親を納得させるケーキを作らなきゃいけないのに――って」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、働いているうちに、昔の気持ちを思い出せたというか」
[嘉祥]: 「洋菓子を作りたいと思った、最初の頃の想いが、よみがえってきて」
reference_answer:
The cake is a new recipe that I've never tasted before, but the flavor definitely belongs to my mentor...
It's a fresh yet nostalgic taste.
[Kashou]: 「...I feel like I've come to this city for the sole purpose of eating this.」
[Beignet]: 「Has it calmed you down a little?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know, but... was I that bad?」
[Beignet]: 「You had the face of a lost kitten.」
[Kashou]: 「Color me embarrassed.」
[Kashou]: 「Honestly, when I was helping with the shop today, I did kind of ask myself, 'Should I really be doing this right now?'」
[Kashou]: 「I thought, 'I should be baking the cake that'll satisfy my dad before Christmas'.」
[Kashou]: 「But, as I worked through the day, I kind of started to remember the old days.」
[Kashou]: 「My desire from when I first started off to make Western sweets had resuscitated.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "……This cake feels like I came to this town just to eat it."  
Beignet: "Have you calmed down a little?"  
Minaduki Kashou: "I don’t know, but……was I that bad?"  
Beignet: "You had the look of a lost kitten."  
Minaduki Kashou: "It’s embarrassing beyond words."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Honestly, while helping out at the shop, I did feel like—was this what I was supposed to be doing?"  
Minaduki Kashou: "I have to make a cake to convince my father by Christmas—"  
Minaduki Kashou: "But as I worked, I guess I remembered how I felt back then."  
Minaduki Kashou: "The feeling I had when I first wanted to make Western sweets has come back."

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「……私は、嘉祥のお父さんではないから、わからないわね。そうかもしれないし、違うのかもしれない」
[ベニエ]: 「言葉というのは、言った本人にすら、本当の意味がわからないこともある」
[ベニエ]: 「１００人が受け取れば、１００通りの解釈があるのが、言葉というものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「大切なのは言葉ではなくて……」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……少し話しすぎたわね」
[ベニエ]: 「長旅のうえに、ずっと働いて疲れたでしょう。シャワーを浴びて、早めに寝るといいわ」
[ベニエ]: 「あ……うっかりしていたわ。空き部屋はあるけれど、ベッドは嘉祥が使っていたものしか空いてないの」
[ベニエ]: 「一緒に使ってもらってもいいかしら？」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「...I'm not your father, so I don't know. Your hunch could be right, or you it could be wrong.」
[Beignet]: 「There's also a chance that not even he himself knows the true meaning behind what he said.」
[Beignet]: 「Words are like that. You give them to a hundred different people, and they'll interpret them a hundred different ways.」
[Beignet]: 「What's important isn't the words. It's...」
[Beignet]: 「No... I've said too much.」
[Beignet]: 「The day's work on top of the long trip must have you tired, no? You should shower up and hurry to bed.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh... How silly of me to forget. There are empty rooms here, but the only one with a free bed is the one that Kashou used before.」
[Beignet]: 「Would the two of you mind sharing?」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "…...I’m not Master Kashou’s father, so I don’t know. It might be possible—or maybe it isn’t."  
Beignet: "Words are such things that even the person who speaks them may not understand their true meaning."  
Beignet: "If 100 people receive (them), there will be 100 interpretations, and that is what words are like."  
Beignet: "What’s important isn’t the words but…..."  
Beignet: "No.... I talked too much. You must have been tired from working after a long journey; you should take a shower and go to bed early."  
Beignet: "Ah.... I wasn’t paying attention earlier (to that). There is an empty room, but the only free bed was Master Kashou’s..."  
Beignet: "...Would it be okay if we shared one?"

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「ダメよ。陽が落ちてから出歩くなんて、危ないもの」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだな。大きなベッドだから、大丈夫だろう」
[時雨]: 「…………えっ！？」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨が嫌なら、話は別だが」
[時雨]: 「は、はわ……はわわ……兄様と……！？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……私、幸せすぎて……気絶しそうです」
[ベニエ]: 「……本当に大丈夫なのよね、嘉祥？」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨はときどきこうなりますが、絶対に大丈夫です。俺を信用してください、師匠」
[ベニエ]: 「うふふ……なら、安心ね」
[ベニエ]: 「そうなの……時雨はこういう子なのね。会えてよかったわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「That will not do. Walking around after sundown could be dangerous.」
[Kashou]: 「That's right. It's a big bed, so we'll manage.」
[Shigure]: 「...Huh?!」
[Kashou]: 「But if you don't want to, that's a different story.」
[Shigure]: 「H-Hah-wah.... Hah-wah-wah... With Nii-sama...?!」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I am in such bliss... I think I might pass out.」
[Beignet]: 「...You're sure you'll be all right, Kashou?」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure just gets like this sometimes. I'm positive we'll be just fine. Please, believe me, Mentor.」
[Beignet]: 「Tee hee hee... One less worry, then.」
[Beignet]: 「I see... So, this is the type of girl Shigure is. I'm glad I've gotten to meet her.」
ModelAnswer:
BEIGNET: "No, it's dangerous to go out after sunset."  
KASHOU: "I suppose so. The bed is big enough; he should be fine."  
SHIGURE: "...……eh?!?"  
KASHOU: "If Shigure doesn’t like this, we can discuss it further."  
SHIGURE: "H, hwa…..hwa wa...….Onii-sama and...!?”"  
SHIGURE: “I-.… I feel so happy that—I might lose consciousness.”  
BEIGNET: "...Really safe, right, Kashou?"  
KASHOU: "Shigure sometimes acts like this, but he’ll be fine. Trust me, Master."  
BEIGNET: "Ufufu…..Then I can relax now."  
BEIGNET: "That's how Shigure is... It was good to meet you too.”

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am to assume that she frequently tidies it up. Rooms are meant to be used, after all.」
[Kashou]: 「Now that you mention it...」
[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」
[Shigure]: 「I tidy up your room back at home almost every day, so it is spotless.」
[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?
[Shigure]: 「It might be that Beignet-san had been waiting for your return this entire time, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure: "You must be maintaining it frequently, right? A room deteriorates if not used."  
Kashou: "...I see..."  
Minaduki Shigure: "If you don’t open the windows or dust regularly, it gets musty quickly."  
Kashou: "Is that so?"  
Minaduki Shigure: "My older brother’s room at home is in perfect condition because I take care of it every day."  
Minaduki Shigure: "I open the windows to air it out, wipe the desk dry, and check the bed’s comfort daily."  
Kashou: "I, I see..."  
The bed’s comfort needs checking every day...?  
Minaduki Shigure: "Beignet-san must have been waiting for my brother to return all this time."  
Kashou: "...I see..."

[Kashou]: 「Hm?」

[Kashou]: 「'Night, Shigure.」
ModelAnswer:

Kashou: "Rather, I’m starting to feel uneasy."  
Kashou: "If I can’t promise self-restrained actions that are rational and common sense, then right now—I’ll pluck you out by the handful from the bed."  
Shigure: "I apologize. I won’t do anything wrong for sure."

Question:
[時雨]: 「はぁ……はぁ……あ、兄様ぁ……」
[嘉祥]: 「何があったんだ、時雨！？　風邪ひいたか！？」
[時雨]: 「だ、だいじょうぶです……私は……兄様が……すごすぎただけで……」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は何もしてないと思うんだが……お前は何もしてないよな？」
[時雨]: 「……はい……私からは、何も……私からは、指１本、触れておりません」
[嘉祥]: 「とりあえず、シャワー浴びておくか？　汗がすごいぞ。シーツが、ぐっしょりだ」
[時雨]: 「汗で済んでよかったです……あやうく、人様のベッドをスプラッター映画の大道具に変えるところでした」
[嘉祥]: 「鼻血か……？」
時雨は起き上がり、乱れた寝間着を直すと、よろよろとシャワー室へ歩いていった。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Hah, hah... Oh, Nii-sama...」
[Kashou]: 「What happened, Shigure?! Did you catch a cold?!」
[Shigure]: 「I-I'll be fine... You were just... too much to handle, Nii-sama...」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think I did anything to you, but YOU didn't do anything, did you?」
[Shigure]: 「...No. I did not do a thing... I did not lay a single finger upon you.」
[Kashou]: 「In any case, why don't you hop in the shower? You're dripping with sweat, and the sheets are soaking wet.」
[Shigure]: 「I am glad it was only sweating I did... I nearly turned someone else's bed into the scene from a splatter film.」
[Kashou]: 「Your nose is bleeding...?」
Shigure rises up, fixes her disheveled pajamas, and staggers her way to the shower room.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure: "Haa... haa... Ah, Onii-sama..."  
Minaduki Kashou: "What happened, Shigure!? Did you catch a cold!?"  
Minaduki Shigure: "I'm... fine... I just... Onii-sama was too much..."  
Minaduki Kashou: "I don’t think I did anything… You didn’t do anything, right?"  
Minaduki Shigure: "...Yes... Nothing from me... Not a single finger touched you."  
Minaduki Kashou: "At least take a shower? You're sweating a lot. The sheets are soaked through."  
Minaduki Shigure: "I’m glad it was just sweat… Otherwise, I would have turned someone else’s bed into props for a splatter film."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Nosebleed...?"  
Shigure stood up, straightened her disheveled pajamas, and staggered toward the shower room.

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうが長く働いてたはずなのに、フレーズのほうが手際がいいくらいだもんな」
[フレーズ]: 「嘉祥さんは細かいところまで丁寧です。見習いたいです」
[嘉祥]: 「そうかな？」
[フレーズ]: 「ときどき、ぼーっとしてますけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……」
[フレーズ]: 「今の嘉祥さんは悩んでいて、考えなくちゃいけないことが、いっぱいあるんでしょうね……」
[フレーズ]: 「パティシエールから、少しだけ事情を聞きました」
[嘉祥]: 「仕事中に、ぼんやりしていい理由にはならないけど」
[フレーズ]: 「そのぶんは、わたしが働きます」
[嘉祥]: 「なんと言ったらいいか……」
申し訳ないような、情けないような。もちろん、感謝の気持ちが一番大きいが。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "I should have been working longer than you, Fraise. You're the one who works so smoothly."  
Fraise: "Master is very meticulous in everything. I want to learn from you."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Is that right?"  
Fraise: "Sometimes he zones out..."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Huh..."  
Fraise: "Right now, Master seems troubled—there must be so many things on his mind he has to think about."  
Fraise: "I heard a little from the pâtissière earlier."  
Minaduki Kashou: "You can't just zone out while working. That's no good reason..."  
Fraise: "Then I’ll work extra instead."  
Minaduki Kashou: "...What should I say?"  
Apologetic, embarrassed—of course, gratitude is the biggest part of it though.

reference_answer:

Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.
There are even some customers stating they're explicitly coming to see her. Most likely standing in that line outside the shop...
ModelAnswer:

Shigure held up her phone, which was filled with praise for Fraise. There were several customers declaring they’d come to visit... Probably among the line outside the shop as well...

Question:
[時雨]: 「間違いありません。話題になったことで大勢が情報を調べ、名店という評価が多かったからこそ。相乗効果です」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、師匠の素晴らしいケーキをより多くの人が知ってくれたから、嬉しいけど」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……明日もこの調子だと、ちょっと大変かもしれません」
[ベニエ]: 「今日が特別だったのよ、きっと」
[ベニエ]: 「今日みたいな行列は、明日はないと思うわ」
[フレーズ]: 「そうですよね……明日は、またパティシエールとわたしだけになりますから」
俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Shigure]: "That's right. Many people researched the topic once it became popular, and that's why there were so many reviews calling it a great shop—it was a synergistic effect."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "As for me, I’m happy that more people know about my mentor’s wonderful pastries… but"  
[Fraise]: "Uuu… If this continues tomorrow, it might get a bit overwhelming."  
[Beignet]: "Today was special. It won't be like today again—I’m sure of that."  
[Beignet]: "A line like today probably won’t happen tomorrow either."  
[Fraise]: "That makes sense… Tomorrow, it will just be me and the pâtissière again."  
We were scheduled to leave tonight. The time difference between France and Japan is 9 hours—we had no choice but to depart around that time if we wanted to return home within three days’ notice.  
Ultimately, I still don’t know what it was missing from me…  
I feel much more relaxed now though…

[嘉祥]: 「俺は、なんだか、いろいろと考えすぎて……最初の気持ちを忘れていたというか……」
[嘉祥]: 「口では目指していると言いつつ、別のことに捕らわれていたように思います」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Oh, my apologies...」
[Beignet]: 「Looks like I wasn't able to help after all.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's not true!」
[Kashou]: 「Eh. Well... I'm just still lost on what my father meant by a 'core'.」
[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」
[Beignet]: 「...Thank you. It warms my heart to hear you say that.」
[Kashou]: 「It's sort of like I've been thinking of so much... I've lost sight of my initial focus...」
[Kashou]: 「I may have said that was my goal, but I was trapped by something else.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah, excuse me..."  
Beignet: "In the end, you didn't help out after all."  
Minaduki Kashou: "No, that's not it!"  
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah... well... I still don’t fully understand what my father means by 'the core.'"  
Minaduki Kashou: "But coming to this place and helping out in the shop made me remember."  
Minaduki Kashou: "I want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone, after all."  
Minaduki Kashou: "The mentor’s cakes are truly delicious—gentle in flavor... they make everyone smile."  
Beignet: "...Thank you. It makes me happy for you to say that."  
Minaduki Kashou: "I guess I overthought things and lost my original resolve, or something like that…"  
Minaduki Kashou: "While saying one thing in words, it seems like I was distracted by other matters instead..."

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「前にも言ったとおり、嘉祥のお父さんの真意はわからないけれど、私は貴方のことを応援しているわ」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます」
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、俺がケーキを作る理由は、何度も話しているけれど……師匠のことは聞いたことがないですよね」
[ベニエ]: 「……そうね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、前に聞いたときは、ケーキを作る理由は、私がパティシエールだからって答えられたんですけど……」
[ベニエ]: 「ふふ……そうだったかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「それなら、パティシエールになった理由は、どうなんでしょうか？」
[ベニエ]: 「……この店は……私の祖母の代からのもので、ずっとケーキを作ってきたの」
[ベニエ]: 「嘉祥の家ほどではないけれど、守るべき伝統があると思っているわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Just as I've said before, I don't know what your father meant, but I support you, regardless.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "As I told you before, although I don't understand the true intentions of your father, I am supporting you."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Thank you."  
Minaduki Kashou: "Now that you mention it... even though we’ve talked about this many times… haven’t they ever heard of Master?"  
Beignet: "...That is true."  
Minaduki Kashou: "No, the last time I asked, my reason for making cakes was given as 'because I'm a patissier.'"  
Beignet: "Mmm... Was that so?"  
Minaduki Kashou: "Then what about your reason for becoming one?"  
Beignet: "...This shop has been in my grandmother’s family since her time, and we have always made cakes."  
Beignet: "It may not be as prestigious as the Minaduki household, but I believe there are traditions worth preserving here too."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ん？　あれ、俺……実家が和菓子屋だとは言ったけど、そんな歴史あるって話はしましたっけ？」
洋菓子を教えてもらうために弟子入りするのに、実家の和菓子屋が老舗だという話は、場違いな気がして避けていたのだが……
[ベニエ]: 「それは……」
[時雨]: 「すみません、兄様！　私が、今朝」
[嘉祥]: 「え？」
[時雨]: 「兄様の状況を知っておいていただく必要がある、と考えまして。差し出がましい真似を……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、いいんだ。隠してたわけじゃないから」
[ベニエ]: 「ええ……時雨から事情を聞いたのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだったんですね。あっ、余計な話をして、すみません。このラ・ソレイユに伝統があるという話でしたよね」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hm? Huh? I... did say that my family owned a Japanese pastry shop, but did I ever mention that they had a history?」
I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...
[Beignet]: 「Well...」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies, Nii-sama! I told her this morning!」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?」
[Shigure]: 「I thought she needed to know about your situation, so I did something rather intrusive...」
[Kashou]: 「No, it's all good. I wasn't trying to keep it a secret.」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... Shigure told me about your situation.」
[Kashou]: 「So, that's how you know. Oh, I'm sorry for cutting you off. You were saying something about the tradition of La Soleil?」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Huh? That, I... when I said my family runs a traditional sweet shop, did I ever mention it has such history?"  
He had entered apprenticeship to learn Western confectionery, but avoided mentioning his family's shop was an old establishment—it felt out of place.  
Beignet: "That is..."  
Minaduki Shigure: "I'm sorry, Onii-sama! I just thought it would be necessary for you to know my circumstances today." She hesitated before continuing. "It was inappropriate of me to imitate such things—"  
Minaduki Kashou: "No, no matter. It wasn’t hidden anyway."  
Beignet: "Yes... Shigure told me the situation as well."  
Minaduki Kashou: "I see. Ah, I suppose this La Soleil also has tradition behind it?"
